https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l0ALS8zUwr9rDSgXhftmHs34rPa.jpg Caroline North is one of the LA's entertainment power-attorneys. She is beautiful, smart and aggressive type-A woman in her 30s. She is also a very lonely workaholic. Her best friends, Jackie and Samantha, decided to end Caroline's long streak of working weekends and lonely holidays by booking a surprise Christmas vacation for her in Prince George, Canada. A Great North Christmas
